name: Moomin mama
text: Oh, hello there dear Snufkin! What a lovely day it is.

name: Snufkin
text: Good morning, Moomin Mama. Yes, the weather is quite pleasant today.

name: Moomin mama
text: Would you like some pancakes? I just made a fresh batch!

name: Snufkin
text: That sounds wonderful. Thank you for your kindness.

name: Moomin mama
text: You're always welcome here, my dear friend.
